p: The release of an inflammatory cytokine TNF-α was evaluated in RIN-5F cells (2 × 10 5 cells/well) that were exposed to high/low glucose concentration and in the absence of glucose for 24 h. The optimized concentrations of vindoline and of the extracts of C. roseus were added to the respective wells and were incubated for 24 h. Following the 24 h exposure to the plant treatments, the media in each well was aspirated, centrifuged and supernatants were then stored at −80 °C until the TNF-α concentration were measured by ELISA.
